attributes.action: Change the law with respect to the length of a sentence for child cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Judges should be able to use their integrity and give longer sentences for certain acts of child cruelty. Where severe acts have been committed a judge should be able to give a life sentence. It should not be possible for the longest sentence available to be less than the period of time the child was subjected to cruelty
